footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• Victims recorded in the reporting year may also originate from an earlier year (initial statistics). Persons who were recorded as victims multiple times in the reporting year are counted multiple times.
• Victims of sexual harassment: Due to methodological changes, the results from 2021 onwards are only comparable with previous years to a limited extend. For more information see "1. General information on the time series" in the national metadata.

footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• Victims recorded in the reporting year may also originate from an earlier year (initial statistics). Persons who were recorded as victims multiple times in the reporting year are counted multiple times.
• Victims of sexual harassment: Due to methodological changes, the results from 2021 onwards are only comparable with previous years to a limited extend. For more information see "1. General information on the time series" in the national metadata.
• For 2010, the population was calculated retrospectively on the basis of the 2011 census and migration, birth, and death statistics. For 2012 to 2021, the retrospective calculation was performed in the same way, but on the basis of the 2022 census.

footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• Number of victims per 100,000 inhabitants (V/100,000) based on the population on 31 December of the previous year.
• Victims recorded in the reporting year may also originate from an earlier year (initial statistics). Persons who were recorded as victims multiple times in the reporting year are counted multiple times.
• Victims of sexual harassment: Due to methodological changes, the results from 2021 onwards are only comparable with previous years to a limited extend. For more information see "1. General information on the time series" in the national metadata.
• From 2013 onwards, the population is based on the 2011 census, and from 2024 onwards on the 2022 census.
